doc.name: outputTextEncoding
doc.summary: The outputTextEncoding property determines what text conversion to perform when writing text strings to stdout.

description.overview:
Use the outputTextEncoding property to determines what text conversion to perform when writing text strings to stdout.
outputTextEncoding is only available when running in CGI mode (Server).

parameter.name: textEncoding
parameter.description: The type of text encoding to use. One of the following.

option.description: use the Windows 'Latin-1' encoding (codepage 1252) [ this is the native text encoding for the Windows engine ]
use the MacRoman encoding [ this is the native text encoding of the Mac engine ]
use the ISO-8859-1 encoding [ this is the native text encoding of the Linux engine ]
use the native encoding for the platform the engine is running on. This is the default

comments.note: The naming of the encodings here corresponds directly to the IANA assigned charset names which is why they are perhaps slightly different from text encoding naming elsewhere in the engine.
